<template>
  <v-app>

        single-line
        hide-details

    </v-card-title>
    <v-data-table
      :headers="headers"
      :items="desserts"
      :search="search"
    ></v-data-table>
  </v-card>
     
    </v-container>
  
    <FooterView />
  </v-app>
</template>
